pages.text:
Welcome to Mystcraft!

There are many worlds waiting to be explored.
Books can be crafted in a crafting table.
Some books you cannot craft, and must find in structures.

Books can be opened and the words clicked on to teleport into their dimension. 

When used, books are dropped at their current location.

This book describes the books and dimensions.

Important!

Since books are dropped on use, always bring a way out! This is most commonly a linking book.
The book won't fall if on a lectern, crafted as a T of slabs in a crafting table.

Linking Book:
Book + Ender Pearl

The most powerful of all books. Empty linking books need to be set by right-clicking, then using the book will teleport the player back to that location.

Sanctuary:
Found in Villages

Sanctuary is a beautiful peaceful world without night or danger. Very nice for building or living in.

Archipelago:
Found in Shipwrecks

This is an island world with hilly forests and swamp. Massive caverns exist deep underwater.

Wasteland:
Found in Desert Temples

This world is hot and barren. The desert stretches endlessly around large volcanic rocks.

Blizzard:
Found in Dungeons

This world is frozen, surrounded by icy peaks. Watch out for powdered snow!

Skylands:
Found in Strongholds

The skylands float in an airy void. If you happen to fall out of the Skylands, you will land in the Pocket Dimension.

The Warrens:
Found in Skylands

No explorer has successfully returned from the Warrens. Enter at you own risk.

Pocket Dimension:
Toss Book&Quill into an End Crystal

This dark world has the unique feature of one block in this world being 16 blocks in the overworld, similar to the nether. This makes it easy to travel long distances.

Death Book:
Book + Bone

This book is a one-way ticket back to where the player last died. It is consumed on use and can only be used once per death.

Player Book:
Book + Player Head

This powerful book can teleport you directly to another player. This must be crafted by dropping the items on the ground.
A player head can be obtained if the player is killed by a charged creeper.

Tip on Moving entities:

If you would like to move an animal or mob across dimensions, hold a lead in your offhand (don't use it) when using a dimensional book. The nearest entity within 6 blocks will teleport with you. Do not use a book while mounted.
